dsl_rule: ASSOCIATED(field1, field2, 'PUCCH-Config in which the PUCCH Resource ID is configured, there is a PUCCH Spatial Relation Info with PUCCH-SpatialRelationInfold as specified in TS 38.331 [5], configured for the uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID field')
predicate: The PUCCH Resource ID is associated with the BWP ID if there is a PUCCH Spatial Relation Info configured for the uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID field

valid: bwp-id: 1, pucch-resource: 'configured with PUCCH Spatial Relation Info for uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID 1'
invalid: bwp-id: 1, pucch-resource: 'configured with PUCCH Spatial Relation Info for uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID 2'

notes: The association between the two fields is based on the configuration of PUCCH Spatial Relation Info for the uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID field

full_api_response.dsl: ASSOCIATED(field1, field2, 'PUCCH-Config in which the PUCCH Resource ID is configured, there is a PUCCH Spatial Relation Info with PUCCH-SpatialRelationInfold as specified in TS 38.331 [5], configured for the uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID field')
full_api_response.predicate: The PUCCH Resource ID is associated with the BWP ID if there is a PUCCH Spatial Relation Info configured for the uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID field

valid: bwp-id: 1, pucch-resource: 'configured with PUCCH Spatial Relation Info for uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID 1'
invalid: bwp-id: 1, pucch-resource: 'configured with PUCCH Spatial Relation Info for uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID 2'

full_api_response.notes: The association between the two fields is based on the configuration of PUCCH Spatial Relation Info for the uplink bandwidth part indicated by BWP ID field
